amendment.description: To prohibit the obligation of funds for the establishment or implementation of an EAS local participation pilot program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1939 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1939 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S13115-13116, S13117-13118; text: CR S13117) To prohibit the obligation of funds for the establishment or implementation of an EAS local participation pilot program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1939 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1939 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
